      • adjustAddedFileSet

        protected VirtualFile[] adjustAddedFileSet(java.awt.Component component,
                                           VirtualFile[] files)
        Implement this method to adjust adding behavior, this method is called right after the files or directories are selected for added. This method allows adding UI that modify file set.

        The default implementation returns a value passed the parameter files and does nothing.

        Parameters:
        component - a component that could be used as a parent.
        files - a selected file set
        Returns:
        adjusted file set
